public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Representa una colección ordenada de objetos .

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Todos los objetos que derivan de tiene un denominado .All objects that derive from have an named . Todos los objetos que derivan de tiene un denominado .All objects that derive from have an named . Sin embargo, si estas colecciones se establecen [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], a continuación, los elementos de la colección deben ser clases derivadas de en lugar de direct objetos.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Esto es porque no admite un constructor público predeterminado.This is because does not support a default public constructor. Por lo tanto, los elementos de un que se estableció [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] normalmente será un clase derivada que es compatible con un constructor público predeterminado, como o .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un y lo asocia a un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . El se agrega a la en un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

returns.span: Esto se desvía de la implementación de estándar para , que debe devolver el índice en el que el nuevo elemento se agregó a la colección.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un y lo asocia a un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . El se agrega a la en un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ejemplo no utiliza literalmente , pero llama de forma implícita el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] compatibilidad para las colecciones de procesamiento.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Para obtener más información sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] y colecciones, consulte [información general sobre XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
